timeline.bodyText: I don't believe we had added the support options for persisting the cache to AuthorizationCodeCredential in .NET and Python. @chlowell Was this in the design for the application authentication feature? If not perhaps we should add it to the backlog and remove from Java until we are ready to do this across languages.
timeline.author: schaabs

replies.bodyText: It was excluded because you need an authorization code to use this credential. If I have the record of a prior authentication, do I still need the authorization code? If I have an authorization code, why do I want to use cached data? Etc.
